summary: Encapsulates a pretrained wav2vec 2.0 model enhanced with Conformer layers to perform per‑frame audio classification, handling input preprocessing, forward inference, and output of frame‑wise logits or labels.
business_intent: Enable developers to integrate high‑accuracy, frame‑level audio analysis—such as speech activity detection, phoneme or sound‑event classification—into applications without building the model architecture from scratch.
